Grades were all I had

Marching band was my jam. We were super heckin' good. Got to go to national events with it. Won first place in the second division bracket my junior year at one competition in Texas. Got to play the halftime show for the collegiate bowl finals that way.
the only time i did well in band enough was i was the only bass clarinet to play in a state concert
and the only one picked from my middle school

Very fond memories there. Got the spark plug award my senior year. It was because "if the spark plug is the piece of the machine that lights the flame that gets every other part in motion, I was the spark plug of the band."
Also, because my father taught automotive at that school, so they thought it'd be a funny tie in.
